title: Judge tosses RNC lawsuit accusing Google’s spam filters of bias
description: A federal judge tossed a Republican National Committee lawsuit accusing Google of illegally suppressing its campaign emails.

title: Justice Department sues SpaceX alleging discrimination against refugees
description: The suit says SpaceX has said for years it could hire only U.S. citizens because of export control laws, but that that interpretation of the law is incorrect.

title: India’s lunar landing leaves a nation enthralled and briefly unified
description: Whatever India’s domestic challenges, the world’s most populous nation enjoyed its moment in the limelight on the world’s center stage.

title: These are some of the notable companies laying off workers
description: The tech, mortgage and auto industries are among the hardest hit with layoffs going into 2023. Among the giant companies are Amazon, Meta and Twitter.

title: Folding phones are suddenly everywhere. Are they any good?
description: Foldable smartphones are having a mainstream moment this summer — but are they worth it? Here’s what you should know.

title: As fires and floods rage, Facebook and Twitter are missing in action
description: Natural disasters in Canada and California highlight how Mark Zuckerberg and Elon Musk have pulled back from the news, complicating emergency responses.

title: AI is so hot even KFC and Williams-Sonoma execs are talking about it
description: More than 1,000 companies mentioned AI in their quarterly reports this summer, up from just 36 a decade ago, according to a Washington Post analysis.
